meanings.definition: A person or thing that protects or defends.
meanings.sent1: My loyal dog is my protector, always keeping me safe.
meanings.sent2: The knight acted as a protector of the kingdom, guarding it from harm.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy teddy bear joked that he was the protector of the toy box.
meanings.sent4: The sturdy oak tree stood as a protector of the forest, sheltering all creatures beneath its branches.
meanings.sent5: The shining lighthouse served as a beacon and protector for ships in the stormy sea.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism that prevents injury or damage.
meanings.sent1: The helmet is a protector for the head, keeping it safe during sports.
meanings.sent2: Seat belts in cars act as protectors, reducing the risk of injury in accidents.
meanings.sent3: The umbrella joked that it was the protector of people from raindrops.
meanings.sent4: The firewall on the computer serves as a protector, blocking harmful viruses.
meanings.sent5: The lock on the door is a reliable protector, keeping intruders out of the house.

meanings.definition: A chemical substance that prevents damage or deterioration.
meanings.sent1: Sunscreen is a protector against harmful UV rays, shielding the skin.
meanings.sent2: Preservatives in food act as protectors, extending their shelf life.
meanings.sent3: The wax coating on fruits joked that it was the protector of freshness.
meanings.sent4: The varnish on the wooden furniture serves as a protector, preserving its beauty.
meanings.sent5: The rust inhibitor is a powerful protector, preventing metal from corroding.
